(Simplified: 缨)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 嬰 indicates the sound; 糹 (thread) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 嬰 [ yīng ] baby, infant; to bother
①用線或繩等做的裝飾品：帽纓子。紅纓槍。纓穗。
②像纓的東西：蘿蔔纓子。
③帶子，繩子：長纓。
纓翅目 [ yīng chì mù ]: see 蓟马
(Simplified: 缨)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 嬰 indicates the sound; 糹 (thread) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 缨

Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:缨

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+7F28

Main pronunciation 主要发音: yīng

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning tassel.

English senses 英语理解: a chin strap; tassel; to annoy, bother

Usage example 用法举例: 纓子 yīng zǐ (tassel)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 3267

Shuowen 说文解字: 冠系也從糸嬰聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 纓 from single-thread (纟)糹 mì and phonetic baby (婴)嬰 yīng simp 缨.

纓字的基本解释

纓
yīng
见“缨”。

纓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yīng］
［《廣韻》於盈切，平清，影。］
“缨1”的繁体字。
(1)系冠的带子。以二组系于冠，结在颔下。
(2)彩带，古时女子许嫁时所佩。
(3)用以系香囊。
(4)用丝或毛等制成的穗状饰物。
(5)鸟颈上的毛。
(6)套马的革带。驾车用。
(7)引申指绳索。
(8)通“嬰”。缠绕。
(9)通“嬰”。遭受。参见“纓繳”。

纓字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　纓； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页943第24
【廣韻】於盈切【集韻】渠成切，?音嬰。【正韻】於京切，音英。【說文】冠系也。【釋名】纓，頸也，自上而繫於頸也。【禮·曲禮】女子許嫁纓。又【玉藻】?冠朱組纓，天子之冠也。　又【儀禮·旣夕】薦馬纓三就。【註】今馬鞅。【周禮·春官·巾車】鍚樊纓。【註】纓，當胷，削革爲之也。又【左傳·桓二年】鞶厲游纓。【註】纓在馬膺首如索帬。　又【集韻】於正切，音郢。義同。

考證：〔【周禮·春官·巾車】錫樊纓。〕　謹照原文錫改鍚。

Basic explanation of words
tassel
yīng
See "ying".
tassel
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yīng］
["Guangyun" Yu Yingqie, calm and clear, shadow. ]
Traditional characters for "缨1".
(1) The strap to fasten the crown. Tie it to the crown in two sets and tie it under the jaw.
(2) Ribbons, worn by women in ancient times when they were married.
(3) To tie the sachet.
(4) Spike-shaped ornaments made of silk or wool.
(5) The hair on the neck of the bird.
(6) Set of leather belts for horses. For driving.
(7) By extension, it refers to ropes.
(8) Through "infant". Entangled.
(9) Through "infant". suffer. See "Ying pay".
tassel
